name: Lorbrena

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: LORBRENA® is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with metastatic non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) whose tumors are anaplastic lymphoma kinase (ALK)-positive as detected by an FDA-approved test.
contraindications: Recommended dosage: 100 mg orally once daily. ( 2.2 ) Severe Renal Impairment: 75 mg orally once daily. ( 2.8 , 8.7 , 12.3 )

adverseReactions: LORBRENA is contraindicated in patients taking strong CYP3A inducers, due to the potential for serious hepatotoxicity [see Warnings and Precautions (5.1)].
